title: Kono Koi wa Kataranai
sinopse:
Kiyono-kun often gets confessed to by his co-worker, Aoyagi-kun. However, when they are alone, Aoyagi-kun acts coldly towards him, making their relationship awkward. On a business trip with just the two of them. Will something change?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot: Q.E.D
